name: Ardour
desc: This community unites students on a common platform to showcase talents in dance, drama, music, songs, and all performing arts.

name: Agile
desc: The student community for games and sports promotes participation in different competitive events in athletics like basketball, football, etc.

name: Analects
desc: 'Humatronics' and 'Wallzine' by 'Analects' are renowned talent searches and wall magazines, garnering widespread acclaim over the years.

name: Acuity
desc: The AOT innovation community offers all engineers a platform to showcase software, hardware, and robotics innovations through competitive events and quizzes.

name: Acclivities
desc: Acclivities members organize NSS activities, environmental awareness and campaigns against alcohol addiction and ragging.
